settings.title: What is your delivery time?
settings.content:
Your standard delivery order will be shipped within 2 working days with Royal Mail 48 tracked, please allow 3-5 working days to receive your order.

Your express delivery order will be shipped on the say day as long as it was placed before 1 pm and delivered next day.

We do not ship orders over the weekend.

Your 3-hour express delivery order will be shipped and delivered within 3-hour frame.

The delivery is only possible in person. Please mention a contract person at the pick up (it can be you, your neighbour, your friend, a building concierge).

BANK HOLIDAYS: We cannot ship parcels on a Bank Holiday. Parcels will be shipped the next working day.

settings.title: Which countries do you ship to?
settings.content: At the moment we only offer shipment across the UK, however we are planning to expand soon. Please drop an email to info@iamvolya.com if you are willing to purchase outside of the UK.

settings.title: Can you help me with sizing?
settings.content: Please contact us at info@iamvolya.com and we will send you the measurements of the chosen item. We also offer try-on service at one of our addresses in London on request. Subject to availability. Please contact to arrange.
